description: Number of degenerate simplices in n-cube.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: B. L. Ratkoe, How many degenerate simplices are generated by n+1 vertices of the unit n-cube?, Amer. Math. Monthly, 86 (1979), 49.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
